an4.159:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
an4.159:4.3: Atha kho aññatarā bhikkhunī aññataraṃ purisaṃ āmantesi:
an4.159:4.4: “ehi tvaṃ, ambho purisa, yenayyo ānando tenupasaṅkama;
an4.159:4.5: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena ayyassa ānandassa pāde sirasā vanda:
an4.159:4.7: Sā ayyassa ānandassa pāde sirasā vandatī’ti.
an4.159:4.9: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, ayyo ānando yena bhikkhunupassayo yena sā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’”ti.
an4.159:4.10: “Evaṃ, ayye”ti kho so puriso tassā bhikkhuniyā paṭissutvā yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
an4.159:4.11: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an4.159:4.12: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so puriso āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
an4.159:5.2: Sā āyasmato ānandassa pāde sirasā vandati, evañca vadeti:
an4.159:5.3: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, āyasmā ānando yena bhikkhunupassayo yena sā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’”ti.
an4.159:6.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena bhikkhunupassayo yena sā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami.
an4.159:6.2: Addasā kho sā bhikkhunī āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
an4.159:6.4: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena sā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami;
an4.159:6.6: Nisajja kho āyasmā ānando taṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavoca:
an4.159:7.3: Taṇhāsambhūto ayaṃ, bhagini, kāyo taṇhaṃ nissāya.
an4.159:7.5: Mānasambhūto ayaṃ, bhagini, kāyo mānaṃ nissāya.
an4.159:8.2: Āhāro pahātabbo’ti, iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ.
an4.159:8.4: Idha, bhagini, bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṃ āhāreti:
an4.159:8.5: ‘neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya, yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāya vihiṃsūparatiyā brahmacariyānuggahāya.
an4.159:8.6: Iti purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi, navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmi.
an4.159:8.7: Yātrā ca me bhavissati anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cā’ti.
an4.159:8.8: So aparena samayena āhāraṃ nissāya āhāraṃ pajahati.
an4.159:8.9: ‘Āhārasambhūto ayaṃ, bhagini, kāyo āhāraṃ nissāya āhāro pahātabbo’ti, iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
an4.159:9.2: Taṇhā pahātabbā’ti, iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ.
an4.159:9.5: ‘itthannāmo kira bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti.
an4.159:9.7: ‘kudāssu nāma ahampi āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissāmī’ti.
an4.159:9.8: So aparena samayena taṇhaṃ nissāya taṇhaṃ pajahati.
an4.159:9.9: ‘Taṇhāsambhūto ayaṃ, bhagini, kāyo taṇhaṃ nissāya taṇhā pahātabbā’ti, iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
an4.159:10.2: Māno pahātabbo’ti, iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ.
an4.159:10.5: ‘itthannāmo kira bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti.
an4.159:10.7: ‘so hi nāma āyasmā āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissati;
an4.159:10.9: So aparena samayena mānaṃ nissāya mānaṃ pajahati.
an4.159:10.10: ‘Mānasambhūto ayaṃ, bhagini, kāyo, mānaṃ nissāya māno pahātabbo’ti, iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
an4.159:12.1: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī mañcakā vuṭṭhahitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā āyasmato ānandassa pādesu sirasā nipatitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
an4.159:12.2: “accayo maṃ, bhante, accagamā, yathābālaṃ yathāmūḷhaṃ yathāakusalaṃ, yāhaṃ evamakāsiṃ.
an4.159:12.3: Tassā me, bhante, ayyo ānando accayaṃ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu, āyatiṃ saṃvarāyā”ti.
an4.159:12.4: “Taggha taṃ, bhagini, accayo accagamā, yathābālaṃ yathāmūḷhaṃ yathāakusalaṃ, yā tvaṃ evamakāsi.
an4.159:12.5: Yato ca kho tvaṃ, bhagini, accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikarosi, taṃ te mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāma.
an4.159:12.6: Vuddhi hesā, bhagini, ariyassa vinaye yo accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaroti āyatiṃ saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī”ti.
